mapper.insert: insert into guest(gno, email, password, name, phone) values(gseq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from guest where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into guest(gno, email, password, name, kakao) values(gseq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{kakao})
mapper.select: select * from guest where email = #{email} and kakao = 1
select * from guest where email = #{email} and kakao = 0
select * from theme where name like #{keyword}
select * from subtheme where name like #{keyword}
select * from coupon natural join admin_coupon where gno = #{gno}
select * from coupon natural join admin_coupon where coupon_no = #{coupon_no}
mapper.delete: delete coupon where gno=#{gno} and coupon_no=#{coupon_no}
mapper.select: select d.joindate , nvl(m.cnt,0) as cnt from (select joindate, count(*) as cnt from (select trunc(joindate,'dd') as joindate from guest where gno > 0) where joindate between #{date} and last_day(#{date}) group by joindate order by joindate) m right outer join (SELECT TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD')+(ROWNUM-1) AS joindate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LAST_DAY(#{date}) - TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 >= LEVEL) d on m.joindate = d.joindate order by d.joindate
select count(*) as cnt from guest where to_char(joindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{yesterday} and gno > 0
select count(*) as cnt from guest where to_char(joindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and gno > 0
